caption.p: Antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity (ADCC) of the immune sera. Serum samples of BALB/c mice ( n = 6) immunized with the recombinant vaccine candidates were assessed in duplicates for their ability to induce NK-cell degranulation measured by flow cytometry. Error bars represent mean ± SD. The NK-cell degranulation values were compared using one-way ANOVA followed by a Tukey’s multiple comparison test (* p < 0.05; **** p < 0.0001).
